title: A ryght pithy, pleasaunt and merie comedie: intytuled Gammer gurtons nedle played on stage, not longe a go in Christes Colledge in Cambridge. Made by Mr. S. Mr. of Art.
author: Stevenson, William, d. 1575, attributed name.
publisher: In Fleetestreat beneth the Conduit at the signe of S. Iohn Enangelist [sic] by Thomas Colwell,
